com.losandes.utils

Class ConfigurationReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.losandes.utils.ConfigurationReader

  • public class ConfigurationReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility Class used to load variables from a properties file. Typically used to load configuration values
    Author:
    CesarF

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConfigurationReader(java.lang.String filename)
      Constructor to create reader, read file and load all variables in tree.
      ConfigurationReader(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String[] variables)
      Constructor to create reader, read file and load variables in tree.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Integer getIntegerVariable(java.lang.String nameVariable)
      Returns a variable requested by parameters as Integer, null: values is not in file
      java.lang.Long getLongVariable(java.lang.String nameVariable)
      Returns a variable requested by parameters as Long, null: values is not in file
      java.lang.String getSetStringValue(java.lang.String nameVariable, java.lang.String variableToSet)
      Gets a variable from tree if variable doesn't exist set by other variable
      java.lang.String getStringVariable(java.lang.String nameVariable)
      Returns a variable requested by parameters as String, null: value is not in file
      void saveConfiguration()
      Saves values in tree map to a properties file
      void setIntegerVariable(java.lang.String key, java.lang.Integer variable)
      Sets Integer variable in values tree
      void setLongVariable(java.lang.String key, java.lang.Long variable)
      Sets Long variable in values tree
      void setStringVariable(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String variable)
      Sets String variable in values tree
